dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: So, what's the haps on smoking, do you smoke?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: An occasional cigar.  I quit cigarettes years ago.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Congrats on quitting cigs, that's a huge feat! What made you keep cigars, just special occasions or?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Isave the expensive ones for special occasions.  I usually have one or two Quorums every day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Quorums are pretty affordable, huh? So, do you think you'll ever quit cigars for good, or is it something you're okay with keeping as a daily habit?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I really have no plans to quit.  That could change in the future, but even doctors I know are happy with cigars.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Some docs say cigars are a safer bet than cigarettes, since you don't inhale, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly.  I suppose vaping is cheaper, but not as much enjoyable.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Vaping's just not the same as a good cigar, is it? There's something about the ritual and taste that's hard to replicate.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yep, and it's a god break during the day.  An hour with a good cigar is a great way to relax.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a lovely way to unwind! An hour to yourself, just chillin' with a good cigar... do you find it helps clear your head at all?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes, if gives me time to think about things or, fairly often, do some birdwatching while smoking one.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Birdwatching and cigars, that's a great combo! Nature and nicotine, haha, sounds like a nice way to slow down and appreciate the little things.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I think it sort of focuses the mind, I'm not sure why.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe it's the ritual of smoking that helps calm your mind and focus your thoughts, like a little meditation session with a cigar.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I think so.  Whatever, it works for me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's all that matters, right? If it works for you, then that's all the justification you need!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly, it beats spending it watching the TV.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: TV can be such a mindless activity, whereas smoking a cigar and watching birds is actually engaging and enjoyable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, it is.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great that you've found something that brings you joy and helps you unwind.
